title: Review: The Argon 18 Dark Matter Isn’t a Gravel Race Bike and That’s Okay
content:
Not everything has to be about racing. Ignore the label and the Dark Matter is a well appointed adventure bike perfect for party pace.

Read the full article at Review: The Argon 18 Dark Matter Isn’t a Gravel Race Bike and That’s Okay on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
